alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 2:13PM CST until December 29 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 213 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hermitage, or 10 miles south of Warren, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello... Hermitage... Wilmar... Green Hill... Ingalls... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Baxter... New Hope in Drew County... Carmel... Farmville... Enon... Selma... Collins... Valley... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Sumpter... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
